name: Astebreed

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Astebreed/Astebreed.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
gogid: astebreed
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    args: -c 'printf "[Software\\Wine\\DllOverrides]\n"mscoree"=""\n"mshtml"=""\n"winemenubuilder.exe"=""\n"
      >> $GAMEDIR/user.reg'
    file: /bin/sh
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing Astebreed
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
